remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載加法運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立將兩個整數相加的運算式。The following code example shows how to create an expression that adds two integers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載加法運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的加法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.

如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node. - 否則，如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`AND`運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `AND` operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. > [!NOTE] > 條件式`AND`運算子無法多載以 C# 或 Visual Basic。The conditional `AND` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic. 不過，條件式`AND`運算子會評估使用位元`AND`運算子。However, the conditional `AND` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `AND` operator. 因此，使用者定義的多載的位元`AND`運算子可以是這種節點類型的實作方法。Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `AND` operator can be the implementing method for this node type. - remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`arguments`不`null`，它必須有相同數目的項目所表示之方法的參數數目為`method`。If `arguments` is not `null`, it must have the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method represented by `method`. 在每個項目`arguments`不得`null`，而且必須是可指派給對應的參數`method`，可能之後*用引號括住*。Each element in `arguments` must not be `null` and must be assignable to the corresponding parameter of `method`, possibly after *quoting*. > [!NOTE] > 只有當對應的方法參數的類型是項目會用引號括。An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type . 引號的表示項目包裝在節點。Quoting means the element is wrapped in a node. 產生的節點是其屬性則是項目`arguments`。The resulting node is a whose property is the element of `arguments`. 屬性產生是空的如果`arguments`是`null`。The property of the resulting is empty if `arguments` is `null`. 否則，就會包含相同項目，做為`arguments`，其中有些可能會加上引號。Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments`, some of which may be quoted. 屬性產生等於所表示之方法的傳回型別`method`。The property of the resulting is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性產生是`null`，兩者均和設為`false`。The property of the resulting is `null` and both and are set to `false`. 屬性等於聯合運算的結果型別。The property is equal to the result type of the coalescing operation. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. #### 結果類型Result Type 下列規則決定的結果型別：The following rules determine the result type: - 如果`left`。類型代表可為 null 的類型和`right`。類型是隱含地轉換成對應的非 null 的型別，結果型別是不可為 null 的對等`left`。型別。If `left`.Type represents a nullable type and `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to the corresponding non-nullable type, the result type is the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type. - 否則，如果`right`。類型可以隱含轉換成`left`。類型的結果型別是`left`。型別。Otherwise, if `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to `left`.Type, the result type is `left`.Type. - 否則，如果不可為 null 的對等`left`。類型可以隱含轉換成`right`。類型的結果型別是`right`。型別。Otherwise, if the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type is implicitly convertible to `right`.Type, the result type is `right`.Type.

.Type and .Type are not convertible to each other.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性產生設定為實作的方法。The property of the resulting is set to the implementing method. 屬性為 `false`。The property is `false`. 如果節點已消除，是`true`。If the node is lifted, is `true`. 否則為 `false`。Otherwise, it is `false`. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果有任一個`expression`。型別或`type`是使用者定義型別定義隱含或明確轉換運算子，表示的運算子是實作的方法。If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the that represents that operator is the implementing method. - 否則就是：Otherwise: - 如果兩個`expression`。型別和`type`代表數值或布林值類型或可為 null 或非可為 null 的列舉類型，實作的方法是`null`。If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`. - 如果有任一個`expression`。型別或`type`參考型別且明確的 boxing、 unboxing，或參考轉換`expression`。若要輸入`type`、 實作方法是`null`。If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`. #### 已消除或非消除Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作之方法的引數類型和實作方法的傳回型別是可指派給`type`，則不會消除節點。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted. - 如果一或兩個的`expression`。型別或`type`是 null 的實值類型，對應的非可為 null 的實值類型分別等於引數類型和實作方法的傳回型別，則會消除節點。If one or both of `expression`.Type or `type` is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果兩個`expression`。型別和`type`都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If both `expression`.Type and `type` are non-nullable, the node is not lifted. - 否則消除節點。Otherwise the node is lifted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立代表類型轉換作業的運算式。The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a type convertion operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks `addMethod`參數必須代表名為"Add"（不區分大小寫） 的執行個體方法。The `addMethod` parameter must represent an instance method named "Add" (case insensitive). 加入方法必須有相同數量的參數中的項目數為`arguments`。The add method must have the same number of parameters as the number of elements in `arguments`. 屬性中的每個項目的`arguments`必須是指派給新增的方法，與對應參數的型別可能之後*用引號括住*。The property of each element in `arguments` must be assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the add method, possibly after *quoting*. > [!NOTE] > 只有當對應的方法參數的類型是項目會用引號括。An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type . 引號的表示項目包裝在節點。Quoting means the element is wrapped in a node. 產生的節點是其屬性則是項目`arguments`。The resulting node is a whose property is the element of `arguments`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來建立，代表呼叫方法來初始化字典集合的項目。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create an that represents calling the method to initialize an element of a dictionary collection. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Expressions.Expression#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Expressions.Expression/CS/Expression.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Expressions.Expression#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Expressions.Expression/VB/Expression.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須是運算式，但不需要採取任何動作，可以使用空運算式。An empty expression can be used where an expression is expected but no action is desired. 例如，您可以使用空運算式做為最後一個運算式中的運算式區塊。For example, you can use an empty expression as the last expression in a block expression. 在此情況下，區塊運算式的傳回值為 void。In this case, the block expression's return value is void. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立空的運算式，並將它加入區塊運算式。The following code example shows how to create an empty expression and add it to a block expression. remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，屬性是`true`。If the node is lifted, the property is `true`. 否則為 `false`。Otherwise, it is `false`. 屬性一律為 `false`。The property is always `false`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載等號比較運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the equality operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果滿足下列兩個條件時，則會消除節點和節點的類型是:If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is : - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立運算式，會檢查其兩個引數的值是否相等。The following code example shows how to create an expression that checks whether the values of its two arguments are equal. remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，屬性是`true`和屬性等於`liftToNull`。If the node is lifted, the property is `true` and the property is equal to `liftToNull`. 否則，兩者都`false`。Otherwise, they are both `false`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method. - 否則，如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載等號比較運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the equality operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點。此外，節點的類型可為 null如果`liftToNull`是`true`或如果`liftToNull`是`false`:If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型可為 null如果`liftToNull`是`true`或如果`liftToNull`是`false`。The type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`.

如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載`XOR`運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the `XOR` operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為整數或布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的結果型別`XOR`運算子。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至預先定義的結果型別`XOR`運算子。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立運算式，代表邏輯 XOR 運算。The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents the logical XOR operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，屬性是`true`。If the node is lifted, the property is `true`. 否則為 `false`。Otherwise, it is `false`. 屬性一律為 `false`。The property is always `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`代表 「 大於 」 運算子多載的使用者定義型別表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "greater than" operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果滿足下列兩個條件時，則會消除節點和節點的類型是:If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is : - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立會比較兩個整數的運算式。The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，屬性是`true`和屬性等於`liftToNull`。If the node is lifted, the property is `true` and the property is equal to `liftToNull`. 否則，兩者都`false`。Otherwise, they are both `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation : - 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是實作的方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method. - 否則，如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`代表 「 大於 」 運算子多載的使用者定義型別表示方法是實作的方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "greater than" operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點。此外，節點的類型可為 null如果`liftToNull`是`true`或如果`liftToNull`是`false`:If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型可為 null如果`liftToNull`是`true`或如果`liftToNull`是`false`。The type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性產生代表委派所表示的傳回型別`expression`。型別。The property of the resulting represents the return type of the delegate that is represented by `expression`.Type. 屬性產生是空的如果`arguments`是`null`。The property of the resulting is empty if `arguments` is `null`. 否則，就會包含相同項目，做為`arguments`除外，其中有些物件可能*加上引號*。Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments` except that some of these objects may be *quoted*. > [!NOTE] > 只有當對應委派的參數所代表項目會用引號括`expression`的型別。An element will be quoted only if the corresponding parameter of the delegate represented by `expression` is of type . 引號的表示項目包裝在節點。Quoting means the element is wrapped in a node. 產生的節點是其屬性則是項目`arguments`。The resulting node is a whose property is the element of `arguments`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來建立表示指定的引數的 lambda 運算式的引動過程。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create an that represents the invocation of a lambda expression with specified arguments. remarks.format: ## Remarks 從這個函數傳回的物件屬於類型。The object that is returned from this function is of type . 類型用來代表傳回的物件，因為 lambda 運算式的具象型別不在編譯時期已知。The type is used to represent the returned object because the concrete type of the lambda expression is not known at compile time. 所表示的委派類型的參數數目`delegateType`必須等於長度`parameters`。The number of parameters for the delegate type represented by`delegateType` must equal the length of `parameters`. 項目`parameters`必須是參考參數運算式中等於`body`。The elements of `parameters` must be reference equal to the parameter expressions in `body`. 屬性產生的物件等於`delegateType`。The property of the resulting object is equal to `delegateType`. 如果`parameters`是`null`、產生物件的屬性是空的集合。If `parameters` is `null`, the property of the resulting object is an empty collection. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立代表增加 1 傳遞的引數的 lambda 運算式的運算式。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a lambda expression that adds 1 to the passed argument. remarks.format: ## Remarks 從這個函數傳回的物件屬於類型。The object that is returned from this function is of type . 類型用來代表傳回的物件，因為 lambda 運算式的具象型別不在編譯時期已知。The type is used to represent the returned object because the concrete type of the lambda expression is not known at compile time. 所表示的委派類型的參數數目`delegateType`必須等於長度`parameters`。The number of parameters for the delegate type represented by `delegateType` must equal the length of `parameters`. 項目`parameters`必須是參考參數運算式中等於`body`。The elements of `parameters` must be reference equal to the parameter expressions in `body`. 屬性產生的物件等於`delegateType`。The property of the resulting object is equal to `delegateType`. 如果`parameters`是`null`、產生物件的屬性是空的集合。If `parameters` is `null`, the property of the resulting object is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載左移位運算子表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the left-shift operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。類型是整數類資料類型 (其中， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，或對應可為 null 的類型) 和`right`。型別是、 實作方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of , , , , , , , , or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is , the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的左移位運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined left-shift operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的左移位運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined left-shift operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，屬性是`true`。If the node is lifted, the property is `true`. 否則為 `false`。Otherwise, it is `false`. 屬性一律為 `false`。The property is always `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`代表 「 小於或等於 」 運算子多載的使用者定義型別表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "less than or equal" operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果滿足下列兩個條件時，則會消除節點和節點的類型是:If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is : - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立會比較兩個整數的運算式。The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers. also, the type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型可為 null如果`liftToNull`是`true`或如果`liftToNull`是`false`。The type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載模數運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the modulus operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的模數運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined modulus operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的模數運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined modulus operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node. - 否則，如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載乘法運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the multiplication operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的乘法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined multiplication operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的乘法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined multiplication operator.

如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載乘法運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the multiplication operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的乘法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined multiplication operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的乘法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined multiplication operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性產生設定為實作的方法。The property of the resulting is set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是 false。Otherwise, they are false. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果`expression`。類型是使用者定義的類型定義一元減號運算子，表示的運算子是實作的方法。If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary minus operator, the that represents that operator is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`expression`。類型是數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric type, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作的方法引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `expression`.類型為 null 的實值類型，而且對應的非可為 null 的實值類型等於實作之方法的引數類型。`expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`，節點的類型是`expression`。型別。If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type. 如果`expression`。類型為非 null，則不會消除節點。If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 否則，則會消除節點。Otherwise, the node is lifted. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立代表算術負運算的運算式。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents an arithmetic negation operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks `arguments`參數必須包含相同數目的項目所代表之建構函式的參數數目為`constructor`。The `arguments` parameter must contain the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the constructor represented by `constructor`. 如果`arguments`是`null`，被視為空的而屬性產生為空集合。If `arguments` is `null`, it is considered empty, and the property of the resulting is an empty collection. 如果`members`是`null`、屬性產生為空集合。If `members` is `null`, the property of the resulting is an empty collection. 如果`members`不`null`，它必須有相同數目的項目為`arguments`，且每個項目必須`null`。If `members` is not `null`, it must have the same number of elements as `arguments` and each element must not be `null`. 每個項目`members`必須，或，代表所表示的建構函式的宣告型別上的執行個體成員`constructor`。Each element of `members` must be a , or that represents an instance member on the declaring type of the constructor represented by `constructor`. 如果它代表的屬性，屬性必須有`get`存取子。If it represents a property, the property must have a `get` accessor. 對應項目`arguments`每個項目`members`必須代表指派給成員類型的類型的屬性，`members`元素代表。The corresponding element of `arguments` for each element of `members` must have a property that represents a type that is assignable to the type of the member that the `members` element represents. 屬性產生代表建構函式的宣告型別，`constructor`代表。The property of the resulting represents the declaring type of the constructor that `constructor` represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的更具特製化的描述比只是其衍生的類型。The property provides a more specialized description of an than just its derived type. 例如，無法用來代表許多不同種類的二進位運算式，例如除法運算或 「 大於 」 作業。For example, a can be used to represent many different kinds of binary expressions, such as a division operation or a "greater than" operation. 屬性會描述這些二進位運算式做為和分別。The property would describe these binary expressions as and , respectively. 運算式的靜態的 CLR 型別，物件代表由屬性。The static CLR type of the expression that the object represents is represented by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性產生設定為實作的方法。The property of the resulting is set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果`expression`。類型是使用者定義的類型定義、 not 運算子的一元表示的運算子是實作的方法。If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary not operator, the that represents that operator is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`expression`。類型是數值或布林值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric or Boolean type, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作的方法引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `expression`.類型為 null 的實值類型，而且對應的非 null 的型別等於實作之方法的引數類型。`expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`，節點的類型是`expression`。型別。If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type. 如果`expression`。類型為非 null，則不會消除節點。If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 否則，則會消除節點。Otherwise, the node is lifted. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立運算式，表示 邏輯 NOT 運算。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a logical NOT operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性產生設定為實作的方法。The property of the resulting is set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用一個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument, it is the implementing method for the node. - 如果`expression`。類型是使用者定義的類型定義、 not 運算子的一元表示的運算子是實作的方法。If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary not operator, the that represents that operator is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`expression`。類型是數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric type, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作的方法引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `expression`.類型為 null 的實值類型，而且對應的非可為 null 的實值類型等於實作之方法的引數類型。`expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`，節點的類型是`expression`。型別。If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type. 如果`expression`。類型為非 null，則不會消除節點。If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 否則，則會消除節點。Otherwise, the node is lifted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，屬性是`true`。If the node is lifted, the property is `true`. 否則為 `false`。Otherwise, it is `false`. 屬性一律為 `false`。The property is always `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載不等比較運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the inequality operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果滿足下列兩個條件時，則會消除節點和節點的類型是:If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is : - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is .

also, the type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是。The type of the node is . - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型可為 null如果`liftToNull`是`true`或如果`liftToNull`是`false`。The type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`.

如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應的結果類型的預先定義的位元`OR`運算子。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的位元的`OR`運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. > [!NOTE] > 條件式`OR`運算子無法多載以 C# 或 Visual Basic。The conditional `OR` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic. 不過，條件式`OR`運算子會評估使用位元`OR`運算子。However, the conditional `OR` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `OR` operator. 因此，使用者定義的多載的位元`OR`運算子可以是這種節點類型的實作方法。Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `OR` operator can be the implementing method for this node type. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別是布林類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，而且對應不可為 null 的型別等於對應的實作方法的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為相同的布林型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的條件式的結果型別`OR`運算子。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至預先定義的條件式的結果型別`OR`運算子。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立代表邏輯運算式`OR`第一個運算元判斷值為時，才評估第二個運算元的作業`false`。The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a logical `OR` operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand evaluates to `false`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載的乘冪運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the exponentiation operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都、 實作方法是。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both , the implementing method is . #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載向右移位運算子表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the right-shift operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。類型是整數類資料類型 (其中， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，或對應可為 null 的類型) 和`right`。型別是、 實作方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of , , , , , , , , or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is , the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的向右移位運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined right-shift operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的向右移位運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.

span.span: or is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果`method`不`null`，而它代表非 void， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 採用兩個引數，方法是節點的實作方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node. - 否則，如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載向右移位運算子表示方法是實作的方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the right-shift operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。類型是整數類資料類型 (其中， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，或對應可為 null 的類型) 和`right`。型別是、 實作方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of , , , , , , , , or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is , the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的向右移位運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined right-shift operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的向右移位運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生具有屬性設定為實作的方法。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是`false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 屬性為 `null`。The property is `null`. 下列資訊描述實作的方法，而節點類型，以及節點是否已消除。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業選取實作的方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果屬性中的其中一個`left`或`right`表示使用者定義型別多載減法運算子，表示方法是實作的方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the subtraction operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型為數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。類型可指派給對應的實作方法的引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的減法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined subtraction operator. - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都可為 null，則會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 節點的類型為 null 的型別對應至預先定義的減法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 不會為 .Type 和 .Type 定義 Subtraction 運算子。

span.span: The subtraction operator is not defined for .Type and .Type.

`left`.型別和`right`。類型為這兩個實值類型，其中至少一個可為 null，對應不可為 null 的型別是相等的實作方法的相對應的引數型別。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`:If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果`left`。型別和`right`。型別都不可為 null，則不會消除節點。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是預先定義的減法運算子的結果型別。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined subtraction operator. - remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有中的物件物件必須具有相同的型別，除非具有類型`void`。All objects in a object must have the same type, unless the has the type `void`. 每個物件具有隱含`break`陳述式，這表示沒有隱含落入從一個 case 標籤到另一個。Each object has an implicit `break` statement, which means that there is no implicit fall through from one case label to another. 如果`switchValue`不符合任何的情況下，會擲回任何例外狀況。If `switchValue` does not match any of the cases, no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立代表不含預設情況的切換陳述式的運算式。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a swtich statement without a default case. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有中的物件物件必須具有相同的型別，除非具有類型`void`。All objects in a object must have the same type, unless the has the type `void`. 每個物件具有隱含`break`陳述式，這表示沒有隱含落入從一個 case 標籤到另一個。Each object has an implicit `break` statement, which means that there is no implicit fall through from one case label to another. 如果`switchValue`不相符在任何情況下，預設情況下，由`defaultBody`執行。If `switchValue` does not match any of the cases, the default case represented by `defaultBody` is run. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立運算式，代表具有預設情況的切換陳述式。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a swtich statement that has a default case. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性產生設定為實作的方法。The property of the resulting is set to the implementing method. 屬性設定為節點的類型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果節點已消除，和屬性都`true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否則，它們是 false。Otherwise, they are false. #### 實作的方法Implementing Method 下列規則決定作業的實作方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果`expression`。類型是使用者定義的類型定義一元加法運算子，表示的運算子是實作的方法。If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary plus operator, the that represents that operator is the implementing method. - 否則，如果`expression`。類型是數值類型，實作的方法是`null`。Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric type, the implementing method is `null`. #### 節點型別和已消除或非消除Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果實作的方法不是`null`:If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果`expression`。類型是指派給實作的方法引數型別，則不會消除節點。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 節點的類型是實作方法的傳回型別。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果符合下列兩種情況，則會消除節點和節點的類型是 null 的型別對應至實作方法的傳回型別：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `expression`.類型為 null 的實值類型，而且對應的非可為 null 的實值類型等於實作之方法的引數類型。`expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method. - 實作方法的傳回型別是在不可為 null 的實值類型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果實作的方法是`null`，節點的類型是`expression`。型別。If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type. 如果`expression`。類型為非 null，則不會消除節點。If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 否則，則會消除節點。Otherwise, the node is lifted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫這個方法提供邏輯，以引導節點的子系。Override this method to provide logic to walk the node's children. 一般的實作會呼叫訪客。在每個子系，請瀏覽和它們的任何變更，應該會傳回已修改的子系本身的新複本。A typical implementation will call visitor.Visit on each of its children, and if any of them change, should return a new copy of itself with the modified children.
